idDocumentDetailstitle: Enter the details exactly as they appear on the document welsh
docNumberHint: This is a 9 characters long. It is usually shown in the top right hand corner of the photo page in the welsh
chooseCountryhint: This is usually shown on the first page of the welsh
biometricPassportHint: This is 9 characters long. It is usually shown in the top right hand corner of the photo page in the passport. Welsh
irishPassportHint: This is 9 characters long. It is usually shown on the front of the card in the top, right hand corner. Welsh
ukDriversLicenceHint: This is 16 characters long. For example, GIBBS911800DA529. Welsh
identityCardHint: This will have between 8 and 12 characters, depending on the country of issue. Welsh
biometricCardHint: This is 9 characters long. For example, ZU1234567. Welsh
passCardHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document. Welsh
ukForceCardHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document. Welsh
ukArmedForceCardHint: This will have between 6 and 8 characters. Welsh
photoWorkPermitHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document. Welsh
photoVisaHint: This will have between 8 and 9 characters. Welsh
ukFirearmsLicenceHint: This will have between 6 and 10 characters. Welsh
photoIdPradoDetailsHint: This needs to be a unique reference or number that is shown on the document. Welsh
error-docNumberInput: Enter the details for the {doc selected} welsh
error-docNumberLength: {doc selected} must be 50 characters or fewer welsh
error-docNumberFormat: {doc selected} must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes welsh
error-noExpiryDate: Enter the expiry date for {doc selected} welsh
error-noExpiryDayMonth: {doc selected} must include a day and a month welsh
error-noExpiryDayYear: {doc selected} must include a day and a year welsh
error-noExpiryDay: {doc selected} must include a day welsh
error-noExpiryMonthYear: {doc selected} must include a month and a year welsh
error-noExpiryMonth: {doc selected} must include a month welsh
error-noExpiryYear: {doc selected} must include a year welsh
error-expiryDateInvalid: {doc selected} expiry date must be a real date welsh
error-expiryDateNonNumeric: {doc selected} must only include numbers welsh
error-dateAfterIdChecksDone: Expiry date for {doc selected} must be after {id checks completed} when you completed the identity checks welsh
error-noCountry: Choose a country for {doc selected} welsh
